i have several questions.
1. why the fuck was her parents naked there? wha- what the fuck???
2. i didn't quite understand the mikage's mother part. did he actually... with her mother? how did she came to that conclusion? i guess because english isn't my first language...
3. how and why the fuck is this girl so skilled in the art of fucking someone's life up? holy shit dude.

Re-reading this, the only redeemable characters in this entire story are Mikage and Ookawa, the Private Investigator. Mikage's mother is 100% the worst and is knowingly & directly responsible for Mikage getting raped just because she wanted Sensei's dick. Apparently Sensei wasn't the only one either, she was quite the slut before and after she got married. Also, it's never said but it's implied that they know Mikage is a bastard child from her affairs  and that's why they constantly fight. It might  also be the reason why the mother neglects the daughter so badly
Mc that deserve to die

Not sure how notsentaws is lost, its just windy. I'll summarize for those lost.

 Guy fucks the wife of a rich families son while tutoring for their daughter. Realizing she'll be forced to protect him if anything gets him in trouble, he rapes their 6-7 year old daughter (Mikado) repeatedly. 

He leaves for probably unimportant reasons, when the daughter tells her psychopathic friend (Sakura, Maa-chan) who, understanding the situation entirely, tricks Mikado into destroying her own family, and upon meeting Morita, works her way into destroying his family too.
YESSSSSS FUCK YOU! DESERVED.
He Fuck up now
